summary: AN ORDINANCE accepting easements over portions of Tract 6 and 7, Bradner's Garden Tracts; and over portions of Lots 6, 7 and 8, Lakeview Acres; and over a portion of the northeast one-quarter of Section 3, Township 23 North, Range 4 East, W.M., for sanitary sewer purposes. (South Bond Street, et al Sanitary Sewers).
